description: Test that the network-based alarm setup alerts when cluster becomes unreachable
prerequisite:
Make sure CloudWatch Synthetics is setup to monitor the DocumentDB cluster (see the [docs](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/monitoring/CloudWatch_Synthetics_Canaries.html). 
Make sure that the Synthetics Name passed in the alarm dimension matches the name of the Synthetic Canary.
